title: Collusion
description: Collusion represents the relationship between insiders. For the purposes of the `recruitment` property, insider1 recruited insider2.

id.description: A unique string that begins with "collusion--" and is appended with a UUIDv4

relationship.description: The type of relationship between insider1 and insider2

oneOf.title: Avoid Detection
oneOf.description: Insider1 needed insider2's access or authorization to avoid detection

oneOf.title: Greater Payoff
oneOf.description: Insider1 received a greater payoff by recruiting insider2

oneOf.title: Insider Resigned
oneOf.description: Insider1 no longer worked at the victim organization and needed insider2 to finish the incident

oneOf.title: Separation of Duties
oneOf.description: Insider1 could not conduct acheive their goals without insider2 due to a separation of duties which limited their access of authorization

oneOf.title: Share the Wealth
oneOf.description: Insider1 recruited insider2 due to a desire to share the wealth

oneOf.title: Other
oneOf.description: Insider1 recruited insider2 for unknown reasons
